short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab assistant. 🤵🐾 Vertical tabs, tab previews, suspend inactive tabs, archive tabs for reading later, with custom themes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabistant is a tab assistant. 🤵🐾

🏖️ So many tabs? Difficult to find tabs? Tabs used up so much memory? Want to keep tabs without putting them in bookmarks? We all know that feeling. Tabistant may help you. 🤝

🈚 Free Features
 ・🗂️ Side panel
 　。📑 Vertical tabs
 　。📚 Comfortable tab management
 　。🔍 Search tabs instantly
 　。💼 Clean, intuitive, and simplified UI
 　。🌘 Default dark theme for Incognito Mode
 　。🧸 Seamless integration with Chrome
 　。🕹️ Native experience

🈶 Premium Features
・🎨 Custom themes
　。Separated themes for Normal and Incognito Mode
　。Custom colors or preset colors
・🗂️ Side panel
　。Further style customization
　。Integrated with tab previews
・📷 Tab previews
　。Automatically capture tab previews
　。Custom quality and frequency
・💤 Suspend tabs
　。Automatically or manually suspend inactive tabs
　。Ignorance options
　。Integrated with tab previews
・🗃️ Archive tabs
　。Export and import to file
　。Integrated with tab previews
　。(ONLY archive tabs instead of websites, NOT for offline reading)

🛡️ Privacy first. All data will only be stored in your profile or local storage. Nothing will be collected from you or shared with third parties, and in fact, there is no server at all. Besides, of course, no tracking or ads.

🔰 A 7-day free trial is already included in the premium. There is also a 3-day free trial without payment info as a special offer for a limited time now.

🔥 Developed in pure JavaScript from scratch, with no frameworks or libraries, lightweight, aiming for ultra performance as much as possible.

💡 Require Chrome 120 or above. Behaviors in other versions or browsers are not guaranteed.

💡 Activation synced through your profile will only be counted as the same single one and could be reused again at any time after deactivation.

🚧 The side panel is limited to a minimum width of 360px by Chrome. It may look a bit wide on small screens. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do until Chrome removes this restriction.

🚧 Saved Tab Group is a new feature of Chrome. However, in the meantime, API does not fully support saved tab groups. Partial operations may not work with saved tab groups.

🚧 Multi-language support is planned, but not with high priority in the current stage. Mainly focus on the English version first.

🛠️ Recent changes
・v1.0.0.4
　。Automatically scroll to the current tab after opening the side panel
　。Fixed auto-scroll on pinned tabs
　。Reduced the delay limitation in searching
・v1.0.0.3
　。Fixed error handling for saved tab groups
　。Changed package description
・v1.0.0.2
　。Changed preset colors
　。Enlarged tab preview on suspended page
・v1.0.0.1
　。Fixed visual bugs
　。Improved color contrast
　。Redirect to shortcuts settings from options
